title: Skin Buying bug during champ select [Client]
body:
I bought a skin during champ select some one dodged and I still have skin and the RP I used to purchase.

I felt like I had to report this, even though it benefited me in the end.

replies.body:
Hey MixMastaBratac - 

Thanks for the honest report! Was this a visual issue? When you relogged your client, was the proper RP showing?
It seems like it. I didn't want to buy a skin with it at the time just in case.
